bibl.title: Despatch from William H. Heard, April 18, 1898
Despatches from United States Consuls in Monrovia, 1852-1906

correspAction.roleName: U.S. Minister Resident and Consul General
Auditor for State and Other Departments

p.add: RECEIVED MAY 21 1898 BURACCOUNTS DEP. OF STATE.

div1.p: Legation of the United States, Monrovia, Liberia, 18 April 1898.

p.add: INDEX BUREAU REC'D. MAY 21 '98 DEPT OF STATE

div1.p: William H. Heard, to the Department of State.
Relief and Shipment of American Seamen
Legation of the United States Monrovia, Liberia, April 18, 1898.
To the Hon. Auditor for State and Other Departments, Washington.

Sir: I have the hoor to inform you that I have relieved the following seamen of the schooner "Alice: of Provincetown, Mass, which was destroyed by fire, in this port, on the 4th instant;- Geo. E. Rich, Edward L. Doyle, St. Augstine Bravo, Peter Scott and August Brett, all citizens of Massachusetts, U. S. A. and Joseph Sauts Estrelinha, Peter Manuel, Theophils Pereina, Mannel de Reis, Manuel Consalue, Joaquin Lopes, Jordan Lopes, and Morral Gonsalina: all these of Bravo, Cape Verde Island. They were relieved according to Consular Regulations 1896- Paragraph 271, and shipped to Freetown Sierra Leone under paragraph 287

same book. I had to negotiate a draft drawn on the Secretary of the Treasury for ($258.54) two hundred and fifty eight dollars and fifty four cents. There are no hospitals in Monrovia, therefore I were oblige to have private physicians. Most of the seamen had African fever and Captain J. A. Chase died from the effects of the same. The seamen were sent to Sierra Leone that they might decure passage on an American Vessel from there: and the mode of living is better, and the peice cheaper there I have here, besides there are bospitals there for treatment of the sick.
I have the honor to be very obediently, William H. Heard Minister Res. and Consul General
Nos 1 to 13 Boarding and Lodging No. 14 Loss by Exchange ,, 15 Convey and to Steamer ,, 16 Passage Monrovia S Leone No. 17 Medical attendance
